name: TopDown Water Sim
description:
This is a java program i made, that simulates water from a top-down perspective. You need to be a bit imaginative, for it to work and the controls cam be a bit tricky, but its still pretty cool.

Controls:
w,a,s,d to move around
q and e to move up and down
x and y to raise or lower the ground
Spacebar to place water at your cursors height

I don't remember why i made this, but it must have been inspired by my jpowdertool. As the water in both projects behaves in a simmilar manner.
After looking around, i found out that this project was created before jpowdertool. Interesting...
